# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_STEERING_BIAS_SCALAR

## Summary
Set the steering bias scalar which can be used to change the steering bias amount when wheel gets shot

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **FLOAT** scalar
